35 namespace xta {
36 
37  Transaction::Transaction(xta_transaction_t *tx)
38  {
39  this->tx = tx;
40  };
41 
42  Transaction::~Transaction()
43  {
44  /* this->tx is just a reference to an object created/destroyed by
45  TransactionManager */
46  this->tx = NULL;
47  };
48 
49  void Transaction::EnlistResource(XaResource *xaRes)
50  {
51  int rc;
52  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (rc = xta_transaction_enlist_resource(
53  tx, xaRes->getCBaseXaResource())))
54  throw Exception(rc, "xta_transaction_enlist_resource");
55  }
56 
57  void Transaction::Open(void)
58  {
59  int rc;
60  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (rc = xta_transaction_open(tx)))
61  throw Exception(rc, "xta_transaction_open");
62  }
63 
64  void Transaction::Start(bool MultipleBranches)
65  {
66  int rc;
67  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (rc = xta_transaction_start(
68  tx, (int)MultipleBranches)))
69  throw Exception(rc, "xta_transaction_start");
70  }
71 
72  void Transaction::Commit(bool NonBlocking)
73  {
74  int rc = xta_transaction_commit(tx, NonBlocking);
75  if ((NonBlocking && LIXA_RC_WOULD_BLOCK != rc) ||
76  (!NonBlocking && LIXA_RC_OK != rc))
77  throw Exception(rc, "xta_transaction_commit");
78  }
79 
80  void Transaction::Rollback(void)
81  {
82  int rc;
83  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (rc = xta_transaction_rollback(tx)))
84  throw Exception(rc, "xta_transaction_rollback");
85  }
86 
87  void Transaction::Suspend(long Flags)
88  {
89  int rc;
90  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (rc = xta_transaction_suspend(tx, Flags)))
91  throw Exception(rc, "xta_transaction_suspend");
92  }
93 
94  void Transaction::Resume(const string& XidString, long Flags)
95  {
96  int rc;
97  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (rc = xta_transaction_resume(
98  tx, XidString.c_str(), Flags)))
99  throw Exception(rc, "xta_transaction_resume");
100  }
101 
102  void Transaction::Close(void)
103  {
104  int rc;
105  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (rc = xta_transaction_close(tx)))
106  throw Exception(rc, "xta_transaction_close");
107  }
108 
109  void Transaction::Branch(const string& XidString)
110  {
111  int rc;
112  if (LIXA_RC_OK != (rc = xta_transaction_branch(tx, XidString.c_str())))
113  throw Exception(rc, "xta_transaction_branch");
114  }
115 
116  Xid Transaction::getXid()
117  {
118  const xta_xid_t *xid = NULL;
119  if (NULL == (xid = xta_transaction_get_xid(tx)))
120  throw Exception(LIXA_RC_NULL_OBJECT, "xta_transaction_get_xid");
121  return Xid(xid);
122  }
123 }
